title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Epistemological Definition and Learning Design in Open Educational Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of "epistemic definition" in Open Educational Practices (OEP) by connecting it to scientific contexts
Learners can generate three or more OEP-based science education scenarios using a learning design framework
Learners can apply and revise epistemic definition principles to their learning design projects based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
